name: Pencil - Wireframe Kit
description:
Quickly mockup your wireframe with Pencil. Easy to share ideas, iterate, prototype to your team/users/customers to get feedback.


Pencil Wireframe Kit contains almost commonly used components, easy to use, update and maintain.


Features

  • Full commonly used components including buttons, input, dropdown, card, tabs, modal, form, images, table,... with variants.
  • Flexible components that work for both mobile and desktop.
  • Easily customize font, colors and typography.
  • Over 1600+ icons included in the wireframe kit from Bootstrap Icons.
  • Fully Auto Layout 3.9
  • Responsive - All components are resizable.
